explains: adj. 逗人发笑的，有趣的
v. 逗乐，逗笑；（提供）消遣（amuse 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: amuse oneself 自娱自乐，消遣

sentences.en: It's a very amusing game to play.
sentences.cn: 这种游戏玩起来非常有趣。

sentences.en: You come over as a capable and amusing companion.
sentences.cn: 你让人觉得是一个能干而有趣的同伴。

sentences.en: The show is very amusing and the cast is very good.
sentences.cn: 表演非常有趣，演员都很优秀。
